#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<climits>

#define mod 1000000007

#define ll long long

#define rep(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define repex(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define in(type,x) scanf("%" #type,&x)
#define out(type,x) printf(#x " = %" #type " ",x)
#define outln(type,x) printf(#x " = %" #type "\n",x)
#define p(type,x) printf(" %"#type" ",x)
#define fill(a,val,n) memset(a,val,n)
#define test int t;\
			 in(d,t);\
			 while(t--)

using namespace std;

ll gcd(ll a,ll b) {if(b==0) return a; return gcd(b,a%b);}

ll power(ll b,ll exp,ll m)
 {ll ans=1;
  b%=m;
  while(exp)
   {if(exp&1)
     ans=(ans*b)%m;
    exp>>=1;
	b=(b*b)%m;
   }
  return ans;
 }

int main()
{test
 {int n,a[100005];
  in(d,n);
  rep(i,0,n-1)
   in(d,a[i]);
  if(n==1)
   {printf("YES\n");
    continue;
   }
  sort(a,a+n);
  ll sum=1;
  int flag=1;
  rep(i,0,n-1)
   {if(sum<a[i])
     flag=0;
    else
	 sum+=(ll)a[i]; 
   }
  if(flag) printf("YES\n");
  else printf("NO\n");
 }
return 0;
}
